welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kettering, a charming town known for its beautiful parks and rich history! We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our lovely city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northampton Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Northampton Airport handles the transportation of goods and packages.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cottesmore RAF Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Cottesmore RAF Airport is used for military operations and personnel.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Royal Air Force Alconbury Airport serves both military and civilian flights.

wifi.note: WiFi access is available throughout the terminal building.
